subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Darius Miller falls into a rare subcategory of Kentucky players under Coach John Calipari: not only a senior but one who figures prominently in the rotation.
